title: UK, Norway to jointly 'hunt Russian submarines' under new pact
description:
London (AFP) Dec 4, 2025


 Britain and Norway on Thursday unveiled a new defence pact that will see their navies jointly operate a warship fleet to "hunt Russian submarines" in the North Atlantic. 

The agreement between the two NATO allies aims to protect c…

by AFP Staff WritersLondon (AFP) Dec 4, 2025
